message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I would like to propose a deal. For this exclusive opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire the product at a special price of $12,000. This is an excellent value considering the market rate and the significant savings compared to the original price. I believe this offer will allow us both to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
